1439.name: 4015 HL-Kb
1439.Applications: Joining and cladding 17% Chromium alloys and cladding components where heat and corrosion resistance is required. The weld deposit can sustain working temperatures up to 450° C. and will offer scale resistance up to 950° C. Preheating is recommended at 250° C and stress relieving at 800° C in case it is allowed for the base metal
